Token.Abstract: This class is for adding features that allow the current user to discover other users of the application
Find other users with the specified criteria.

Parameter.Name: fieldMatchDictionary
Parameter.Abstract: a NSDictionary with the keys being the user attributes to look-up, and the value the match criteria. Valid attribute keys are KCSUserAttributeUsername, KCSUserAttributeSurname, KCSUserAttributeGivenname, and KCSUserAttributeEmail. The valid attributes are further described in the KCSUser doc.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be called when the operation is complete or an error occurs. If the lookup is sucessful the value for objectsOrNil be a NSArray where each element is a NSDictionary providing all the public fields of the matching user(s).

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be called during the lookup operation, if data is available.

ReturnValue.Abstract: KCSRequest object that represents the pending request made against the store. Since version 1.36.0
